scripts.name: Middle Click Pearl
scripts.author: ImproperIssues
scripts.desc: Middle click your mouse to throw a pearl

scripts.name: Double Click
scripts.author: ImproperIssues
scripts.desc: Clicks a second time when you release your mouse

scripts.name: Auto Totem
scripts.author: ImproperIssues
scripts.desc: Automatically replenishes your totems in your inventory

scripts.name: Anti Weakness
scripts.author: ImproperIssues
scripts.desc: Allows crystalling even if you have weakness

scripts.name: Anchor Place
scripts.author: ImproperIssues
scripts.desc: Places a fully charged anchor when you right click your sword

scripts.name: Sworld Hit
scripts.author: ImproperIssues
scripts.desc: Guarantees you hit your opponents with a sword and not anything else

scripts.name: Fast EXP
scripts.author: vgs
scripts.desc: Uses experience bottles quickly while holding right-click
